DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety , tolerability immunogenicity 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate ( 13vPnC ) vaccine compare Prevenar ( 7vPnC ) , give concomitantly routine paediatric vaccine United Kingdom .
